FuncDef: This command configures keepalive parameters to monitor ILMI link connectivity.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount of time, in seconds, between successive transmissions of ILMI messages on this interface for the purpose of detecting the establishment of ILMI connectivity. Values-1 to 255.
Specifies the number of consecutive polls on this interface for which no ILMI response message is received before ILMI connectivity is declared lost. Values-1 to 255.
Specifies the frequency for testing for connectivity when the link is establishing before polling begins. Values-0 to 255.
